title: EiiChuang Wolf Curtains, Galaxy Blue Earth Sky Star Winter Ice Snow Frozen Forest Wolf Print Curtains Waterproof Fabric, Grommet Window Drapes for Living Room Kids Bedroom, 2 Panel Set 27.5 x 39 Inch
features: ★High-quality Materials: 100% polyester soft silky extra durable innovative 150 GSM fabric, this fabric is thinner than ordinary fabrics, but has a higher density, which is waterproof and protects privacy. It will not fade for a long time and it can also ensure the best HD printing effect.Our wolf theme curtains have perfect room decoration function, can darken the room by 30%-50%, and 100% privacy protection.

★Eco-Friendly: Our wolf print curtains non-toxic, tasteless, high strength, wear-resistant, vinyl free, no chemical coating. These light-weight printed curtains are safe and healthy for kids and nursery.

★Beautiful Design: These wolf pattern curtains will certainly upgrade your home decor at no cost. Will go with any decor, white on the other side that faces out the window. Like the real wolf, the 3d curtains give off a gorgeous tint in the whole room, brighten up your living space and ease your mind.

★Ready Made: Includes 2 panels, excluding curtain rods. If your style is modern or trendy, wolf grommets curtains will complement your decor. Grommets per panel each with a 1.6 inch(4cm) inner diameter, slides smoothly back and forth. Before choosing wolf curtain, please measure the size of the rod and window. (Support to customize the same style of Rod Pocket Curtains)

★Easy To Care: The delicate sewing makes durable wolf curtains hard to damage and wrinkle in use. can be machine washed in cold water Don't bleach.If you are not happy with your, please contact us and we will rectify the situation within 24 hours to ensure you are satisfied.
description: Whether are you tired of the invariable curtain style in your home?

As manufacturers of digitally printed home textiles, we follow current trends and bring you the latest home fashion. With the beautiful color and exclusive pattern,these pattern design curtains add a great perspective to the look of your room. the curtains can beautifully decorate your rooms. High resolution pictures bring 3D like realistic experience to your life. It fit for bedroom,living room,study room,and more other places. Quick and luxurious way to refresh and completely change the appearance of your home without a big expense. A perfect gift idea for your mom, dad, sister, brother, grandma, grandpa, wife, husband, son, daughter and other beloved ones with of designs.

- Soft fabric,eco-friendly,durable and wear resistant - Equisite sewing edges,fashionable and elegant,printing and dyeing is eco-friendly and nontoxic,high dust-proof fabric - The cloth is soft and comfortable,smooth,high lightproof - Digital Printing,clear image,solid effect,realistic and vivid feeling,won't fade over and over.

★Due to different computer/screen displays, the color of the actual product may be slightly different from the above picture ★In order to achieve the perfect visual effect, please enjoy it 2 meters away ★Do not wash with hot water, and do not use chlorine bleach. ★Due to manual measurement, please allow an error of 0.39" -1.18" (1-3 cm)

If you have any questions or problems before and after the purchase, please contact us by email, we will reply to you as soon as possible and provide you with the most satisfactory solution.(From processing to transportation, we can deliver it in about 2 weeks)
